chapters.title: Prologue:  Lightnings
chapters.info: The Prophet of the Dragon, p. 49 (48)—Title given Masema as the self-appointed bringer of the news of the Rebirth of the Dragon. He is not necessarily sane anymore, but has gained a very large following. Rand is getting to the point where he plans to do something about him, and just sent Perrin to Ghealdan with a few of the Asha'man and some of the sworn Aes Sedai to bring him in line. See also Dagar, Masema.
